verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "See,<WH7200> I make<WH5414> you [as] God<WH430> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> and your brother<WH251> Aaron<WH175> shall be your prophet.<WH5030>

"You shall speak<WH1696> all<WH3605> that I command<WH6680> you, and your brother<WH251> Aaron<WH175> shall speak<WH1696> to Pharaoh<WH6547> that he let<WH7971> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> go<WH7971> out of his land.<WH776>
"But I will harden<WH7185> Pharaoh's heart<WH3820> that I may multiply<WH7235> My signs<WH226> and My wonders<WH4159> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

"When Pharaoh<WH6547> will not listen<WH8085> to you, then I will lay<WH5414> My hand<WH3027> on Egypt,<WH4714> and bring<WH3318> out My hosts,<WH6635> My people<WH5971> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> from the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> by great<WH1419> judgments.<WH8201>

"And the Egyptians<WH4714> shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord,<WH3068> when I stretch<WH5186> out My hand<WH3027> on Egypt<WH4714> and bring<WH3318> out the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from their midst.<WH8432>"
So Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> [it;] as the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> them, thus<WH3651> they did.<WH6213>
And Moses<WH4872> was eighty<WH8084> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and Aaron<WH175> eighty-three, when they spoke<WH1696> to Pharaoh.<WH6547>
Now the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

"When<WH3588> Pharaoh<WH6547> speaks<WH1696> to you, saying,<WH559> 'Work<WH5414> a miracle,<WH4159>' then you shall say<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> 'Take<WH3947> your staff<WH4294> and throw<WH7993> [it] down<WH7993> before<WH6440> Pharaoh,<WH6547> [that] it may become<WH1961> a serpent.<WH8577>'"

So Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> came<WH935> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> and thus<WH3651> they did<WH6213> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded;<WH6680> and Aaron<WH175> threw<WH7993> his staff<WH4294> down<WH7993> before<WH6440> Pharaoh<WH6547> and his servants,<WH5650> and it became<WH1961> a serpent.<WH8577>

Then Pharaoh<WH6547> also<WH1571> called<WH7121> for [the] wise<WH2450> men<WH2450> and [the] sorcerers,<WH3784> and they also,<WH1571> the magicians<WH2748> of Egypt,<WH4714> did<WH6213> the same<WH3651> with their secret<WH3909> arts.<WH3909>
For each<WH376> one<WH376> threw<WH7993> down<WH7993> his staff<WH4294> and they turned<WH1961> into serpents.<WH8577> But Aaron's staff<WH4294> swallowed<WH1104> up their staffs.<WH4294>
Yet Pharaoh's heart<WH3820> was hardened,<WH2388> and he did not listen<WH8085> to them, as the Lord<WH3068> had said.<WH1696>
Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Pharaoh's heart<WH3820> is stubborn;<WH3515> he refuses<WH3985> to let<WH7971> the people<WH5971> go.<WH7971>

"Go<WH1980> to Pharaoh<WH6547> in the morning<WH1242> as he is going<WH3318> out to the water,<WH4325> and station<WH5324> yourself<WH5324> to meet<WH7122> him on the bank<WH8193> of the Nile;<WH2975> and you shall take<WH3947> in your hand<WH3027> the staff<WH4294> that was turned<WH2015> into a serpent.<WH5175>

"And you will say<WH559> to him, 'The Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of the Hebrews,<WH5680> sent<WH7971> me to you, saying,<WH559> "Let<WH7971> My people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that they may serve<WH5647> Me in the wilderness.<WH4057> But behold,<WH2009> you have not listened<WH8085> until<WH5704> now.<WH3541> "

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "By this<WH2088> you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord:<WH3068> behold,<WH2009> I will strike<WH5221> the water<WH4325> that is in the Nile<WH2975> with the staff<WH4294> that is in my hand,<WH3027> and it shall be turned<WH2015> to blood.<WH1818>

"And the fish<WH1710> that are in the Nile<WH2975> will die,<WH4191> and the Nile<WH2975> will become<WH887> foul;<WH887> and the Egyptians<WH4714> will find<WH3811> difficulty<WH3811> in drinking<WH8354> water<WH4325> from the Nile.<WH2975>"' "

Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "Say<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> 'Take<WH3947> your staff<WH4294> and stretch<WH5186> out your hand<WH3027> over<WH5921> the waters<WH4325> of Egypt,<WH4714> over<WH5921> their rivers,<WH5104> over<WH5921> their streams,<WH2975> and over<WH5921> their pools,<WH98> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> their reservoirs<WH9288> of water,<WH4325> that they may become<WH1961> blood;<WH1818> and there shall be blood<WH1818> throughout all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> both in [vessels of] wood<WH6086> and in [vessels of] stone.<WH68>'"

So Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175> did<WH6213> even<WH3651> as the Lord<WH3068> had commanded.<WH6680> And he lifted<WH7311> up the staff<WH4294> and struck<WH5221> the water<WH4325> that [was] in the Nile,<WH2975> in the sight<WH5869> of Pharaoh<WH6547> and in the sight<WH5869> of his servants,<WH5650> and all<WH3605> the water<WH4325> that [was] in the Nile<WH2975> was turned<WH2015> to blood.<WH1818>

And the fish<WH1710> that [were] in the Nile<WH2975> died,<WH4191> and the Nile<WH2975> became<WH887> foul,<WH887> so that the Egyptians<WH4714> could<WH3201> not drink<WH8354> water<WH4325> from the Nile.<WH2975> And the blood<WH1818> was through all<WH3605> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

But the magicians<WH2748> of Egypt<WH4714> did<WH6213> the same<WH3651> with their secret<WH3909> arts;<WH3909> and Pharaoh's heart<WH3820> was hardened,<WH2388> and he did not listen<WH8085> to them, as the Lord<WH3068> had said.<WH1696>
Then Pharaoh<WH6547> turned<WH6437> and went<WH935> into his house<WH1004> with no<WH3808> concern<WH7896> <WH3820> even<WH1571> for this.<WH2088>
So all<WH3605> the Egyptians<WH4714> dug<WH2658> around<WH5439> the Nile<WH2975> for water<WH4325> to drink,<WH8354> for they could<WH3201> not drink<WH8354> of the water<WH4325> of the Nile.<WH2975>
And seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> passed<WH4390> after<WH310> the Lord<WH3068> had struck<WH5221> the Nile.<WH2975>
